divs: Sighting Detailsi was watching television. it was bright and caught my eye out the window, i thought it might have been a reflection from the tv but stood up and it was still there, i went to get my camera in my mobile phone and when i looked bacck up it was gone. Iv seen shooting stars and some meteors but this was like a green bunsen burner flame flying through the sky.
Summary: Bright ball with green flame behind it. Very fast
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Glasgow
There was one other sighting in Glasgow on or around March 3rd 2012
